```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test cor2cov.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
X <- MASS::mvrnorm(
  n = 10,
  mu = c(0, 0),
  Sigma = matrix(
    data = c(
      1,
      .5,
      .5,
      1
    ),
    ncol = 2
  )
)
A <- cor(X)
B <- cov(X)
colnames(B) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(B))
rownames(B) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(B))
v <- sqrt(diag(B))
knitr::kable(
  x = B,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Covariance Matrix"
)
```


## Results


```{r results}
C <- matrixR::cor2cov(A, v)
colnames(C) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(C))
rownames(C) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(C))
knitr::kable(
  x = C,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Covariance Matrix from cor2cov"
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat, echo = TRUE}
test_that("B.", {
  for (i in 1:nrow(B)) {
    for (j in 1:ncol(B)) {
      expect_equal(
        B[i, j],
        C[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
```
